languages.text: "Все эти обломки мира-корабля, все эти пленники... оно того стоило, ксенос?"
"All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"
languages.original_text: "Все эти обломки мира-корабля, все эти пленники... оно того стоило, ксенос?"

traits.locale_text: "All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"

languages.text: « Tous ces fragments de vaisseau-monde, tous ces prisonniers... Cela en valait-il la peine, xénos ? »
languages.original_text: "All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"

traits.locale_text: « Tous ces fragments de vaisseau-monde, tous ces prisonniers... Cela en valait-il la peine, xénos ? »

languages.text: “那些方舟世界的碎片，还有那些囚犯……这么做真的值得吗，异形？”
languages.original_text: "All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"

traits.locale_text: “那些方舟世界的碎片，还有那些囚犯……这么做真的值得吗，异形？”

languages.text: "All die Weltenschiff-Fragmente, all die Gefangenen ... War es das wert, Xenos?"
languages.original_text: "All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"

traits.locale_text: "All die Weltenschiff-Fragmente, all die Gefangenen ... War es das wert, Xenos?"

languages.text: «Todos esos fragmentos del mundo astronave, todos esos prisioneros... ¿Crees que ha valido la pena, xenos?».
languages.original_text: "All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"

traits.locale_text: «Todos esos fragmentos del mundo astronave, todos esos prisioneros... ¿Crees que ha valido la pena, xenos?».

languages.text: 「この方舟の破片に、囚人達…ご満足か、異種族め」
languages.original_text: "All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"

traits.locale_text: 「この方舟の破片に、囚人達…ご満足か、異種族め」

languages.text: "Tüm bu gemidünya parçaları, tüm bu mahkûmlar... Buna değer miydi zeno?"
languages.original_text: "All those craftworld fragments, all those prisoners... Was it all worth it, xenos?"

traits.locale_text: "Tüm bu gemidünya parçaları, tüm bu mahkûmlar... Buna değer miydi zeno?"
